title: Butter Cookies
procedure: Preheat oven to 170°C (340°F). Line a baking tray with parchment paper.
Cream butter and powdered sugar until light and smooth.
Add vanilla extract and mix well.
Add flour and salt; mix gently to form a soft dough.
Transfer dough to a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle.
Pipe cookies onto the prepared tray.
Bake for 10–12 minutes until edges are lightly golden.
Cool completely before storing in an airtight container.

title: Vanilla Tea Cake
description: Soft and fluffy vanilla cake perfect with tea.
procedure: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease and line a loaf or round cake tin.
Cream butter and sugar until pale and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Mix in vanilla extract.
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Add dry ingredients alternately with milk to the batter.
Pour batter into prepared tin and level the top.
Bake for 30–35 minutes or until a skewer inserted comes out clean.
Cool before slicing and serving.

title: Eggless Chocolate Loaf Cake
description: Moist and rich eggless chocolate loaf cake.
procedure: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease and line a loaf tin.
Sift together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt.
In a bowl, mix sugar, oil, milk and vanilla extract until combined.
Add dry ingredients to the wet mixture and mix gently.
Stir in vinegar or lemon juice; mix lightly.
Pour batter into prepared loaf tin and tap gently.
Bake for 35–40 minutes until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.
Cool completely before slicing.
